text:
ISTs may come back in the gastrointestinal tract or in other parts of the body. They are usually found in the abdomen, peritoneum, and/or liver.    -  Refractory: These tumors have not gotten better with treatment.",CancerGov,Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumors
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumors ?,"New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.
                    Information about clinical trials is available from the NCI website.
